entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
